Articles.Content:
Greetings from Kerizona!

Been playing about 2 months but was just today able to log in.

Just wanted to say thanks to the designers and all those who've put in so much time and effort to make this such an excellent sim.

And yes, I've learned quite a bit just from lurking and reading, so thanks to all of you with the ideas and tutorials.
Welcome! And this game is like wine. It gets better as time goes on as new features are added

'Welcome! And this game is like wine. It gets better as time goes on'

Yup, I play all night and have a headache in the morning, just like wine.
